item.title: WordPress - add meta tags: author, description, keywords, etc
item.description: After reading some SEO stuff I wanted to add some meta tags to my WordPress blog. I found this site: codex.wordpress.org/Meta_Tags_in_WordPress. So WordPress thinks that it’s not necessary to have this meta tags any more… But I want it! ðŸ˜ƒ Next funny thing is how they suggest to add meta tags: copy header.php - what about theme updates? I prefer to use functions.php file - just create it in your courrent theme directory with such content:
